product_name: Black Diamond Super Chute Rope Bag
long_description: The Black Diamond Super Chute rope bag helps you protect your climbing rope by keeping it clean. Features a funnel-shaped rope tarp to make loading the rope into the bag easier; rope tarp dimensions are 57 x 49 in. Compressions straps with metal buckles secure the load. Adjustable shoulder strap makes it easy to tote the bag to the crag. Drawcord closure secures the rope inside the bag. Holds up to an 80m rope.
short_description: The Black Diamond Super Chute rope bag helps you protect your climbing rope by keeping it clean.
